PHRASE.LANG: Become the hero of Castlevania: Lords of Shadow by wearing the Brotherhood of Light gear along with Gabriel’s hair. **Gabriel Belmont Brotherhood of Light Gauntlets, Gabriel Belmont Brotherhood of Light Greaves, Gabriel Belmont Brotherhood of Light Armor, Gabriel Belmont Wig** [#Legal]

Deviens le héros de Castlevania: Lords of Shadow en portant le costume de la Confrérie des Lumières ainsi que la perruque de Gabriel.**Gants Gabriel Belmont Confrérie des Lumières, Jambières Gabriel Belmont Confrérie des Lumières, Armure Gabriel Belmont Confrérie des Lumières, Perruque Gabriel Belmont**[#Legal]

Werde der Held von Castlevania: Lords of Shadow, indem du das "Bruderschaft des Lichts"-Kostüm zusammen mit Gabriels Perücke trägst.**"Gabriel Belmont - Bruderschaft des Lichts"-Panzerhandschuhe, "Gabriel Belmont - Bruderschaft des Lichts"-Beinschienen, "Gabriel Belmont - Bruderschaft des Lichts"-Rüstung, "Gabriel Belmont"-Perücke**[#Legal]

Diventa l'eroe di "Castelvania: Lords of Shadow", indossando il costume della Confraternita della Luce con la parrucca di Gabriel.**Guanti Gabriel Belmont Confraternita della Luce, Parastinchi Gabriel Belmont Confraternita della Luce, Armatura Gabriel Belmont Confraternita della Luce, Parrucca Gabriel Belmont**[#Legal]

Conviértete en el héroe de Castlevania: Lords of Shadow, usando el vestuario de la Hermandad de la Luz con la cabellera de Gabriel.**Guanteletes Hermandad de la Luz de Gabriel Belmont, Grebas Hermandad de la Luz de Gabriel Belmont, Armadura Hermandad de la Luz de Gabriel Belmont, Peluca de Gabriel Belmont**[#Legal]

Become the hero of Castlevania: Lords of Shadow by wearing the Brotherhood of Light gear along with Gabriel’s hair. **Gabriel Belmont Brotherhood of Light Gauntlets, Gabriel Belmont Brotherhood of Light Greaves, Gabriel Belmont Brotherhood of Light Armor, Gabriel Belmont Wig** [#Legal]
